aboutCards.heading: Columbia Sycamore Tree
aboutCards.description: This is the Big Tree By the library. With a little more description to lengthen.

aboutCards.heading: Tree Towards Center Campus
aboutCards.description: This is a tree By Center campus to the north just past the sidewalk.

aboutCards.heading: Densely branched tree behind Coover
aboutCards.description: This tree is located behind Coover Hall. It's in a prime location for a post-TLA study session climb!

aboutCards.heading: Tree next to Sukup Sign
aboutCards.description: This tree is located next to the Sukup Hall and Atrium sign.

aboutCards.heading: Tree near Gilman
aboutCards.description: This welcoming tree is located near Gilman, with plenty of low hanging branches for accessible climbing

aboutCards.heading: Baseball court In Brookside Park
aboutCards.description: This is a challenging climb because the bigger branches that can be used all tower vertically. It is very fun to manuver between them however. Once you get towards the top, there are good places to sit in the branches.

aboutCards.heading: North Hiking Trail in Brookside Park
aboutCards.description: Very tall tree in the forest hiking and biking trails north of Brookside Park. Not for climbing but great to walk by.

aboutCards.heading: Amazing Climb Near Skatepark
aboutCards.description: Highly Recommended climb. Found in the forest hiking trail south of the Georgie Tsushima Memorial Skate Park.

aboutCards.heading: Giant Tree on North Brookside Park Biking Path
aboutCards.description: Find this giant tree on the paved biking and wallking trail on the north east side of brookside park. Towering over the left side of the trail.

aboutCards.heading: Nice Tree North of Bessey Hall
aboutCards.description: Find this tree on the north side of Bessey Hall. Will be difficult to climb but can meet under.

aboutCards.heading: NorthWest Lawn of Logamarcino Lawn
aboutCards.description: Easy to climb in the north west lawn of the logamarcino building on campus. Very public location.

slideCards.heading: Club Events:
slideCards.description: Join us on October 31st for our Haunted Heights Tree Climb

slideCards.heading: Who are we?
slideCards.description: ISU students who share a love for climbing and getting outdoors!

slideCards.heading: Leadership
slideCards.description: We are currently looking for a social media outreach specialist, contact us for more information!
